summary: Southern Methodist University is in Dallas, Texas.
full_text: Southern Methodist University  is a private research university in Dallas. Founded in 1911 by the Methodist Episcopal Church, South, SMU operates satellite campuses in Plano, Texas, and Taos, New Mexico. SMU is owned by the South Central Jurisdiction of the United Methodist Church. Of the university's 10,800 students, 6,300 are undergraduates.
title: Southern Methodist University
